title: Best of The Herd: 03/22/2019
itunes:title: Best of The Herd: 03/22/2019
description:
Colin thinks LeBron James and Doc Rivers have zero things to gain from one another and have nothing to give each other. He wonders how Zion Williamson will fare in the NBA after being coddled at Duke. And he believes the Colts understand how to determine value in players and avoid overpaying for talent.  Presented by Perky Jerky.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
